spec_data.Name: perl-Pod-Abstract
spec_data.Description:
POD::Abstract provides a means to load a POD (or POD compatible) document
without direct reference to it's syntax, and perform manipulations on the
abstract syntax tree.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Fri 28 Jul 2017 03:12:13 PM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: Abstract document tree for Perl POD documents
